required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Oral Hygiene and Maternity Outcomes Multicenter Study (OHMOM)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate Late First to Mid-Second Trimester Introduction of Advanced Daily Oral Hygiene on Gingivitis and Maternity Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock: This study will track changes in oral health in pregnant women. Subjects will be assigned to either regular oral care or advanced oral care and be given oral care products to use until they deliver. A comparison between the two groups (regular and advanced oral care) will be made to see if the oral care products impacted oral health and maternity variables.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Löe-Silness Gingivitis Index
primary_outcome.description: Score Criteria 0 Normal gingiva. Mild inflammation - slight change in color, slight edema. No bleeding on probing. Moderate inflammation - redness, edema, and glazing. Bleeding on probing. Severe inflammation - marked redness, edema. Ulceration. Tendency to spontaneous bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Löe-Silness Gingivitis Index
primary_outcome.description: Score Criteria 0 Normal gingiva. Mild inflammation - slight change in color, slight edema. No bleeding on probing. Moderate inflammation - redness, edema, and glazing. Bleeding on probing. Severe inflammation - marked redness, edema. Ulceration. Tendency to spontaneous bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Löe-Silness Gingivitis Index
primary_outcome.description: Score Criteria 0 Normal gingiva. Mild inflammation - slight change in color, slight edema. No bleeding on probing. Moderate inflammation - redness, edema, and glazing. Bleeding on probing. Severe inflammation - marked redness, edema. Ulceration. Tendency to spontaneous bleeding.

arm_group.description: toothpaste, toothbrush, mouth rinse and dental floss plus specialized education

intervention.description: floss the whole mouth once daily
dentifrice: twice daily brush thoroughly for 2 minutes
twice daily brush thoroughly for 2 minutes
intervention.other_name: Oral-B® ProfessionalCare Series 1000 toothbrush, Oral-B® Precision Clean brush head

intervention.description: mouth rinse: rinse with 20 mL of mouth rinse for 30 seconds twice daily
floss the whole mouth once daily
intervention.other_name: Glide® Pro-Health Deep Clean dental floss

overall_official.affiliation: School of Dentistry University of Pennsylvania
School of Dentistry University of Alabama

group.title: Regular Oral Hygiene
group.description: toothpaste, toothbrush and dental floss 0.243% sodium fluoride: dentifrice: brush thoroughly twice daily toothbrush: brush thoroughly twice daily dental floss: floss the whole mouth once daily

group.title: Advanced Oral Hygiene Plus Counseling
group.description: toothpaste, toothbrush, mouth rinse and dental floss plus specialized education 0.454% stannous fluoride: dentifrice: twice daily brush thoroughly for 2 minutes toothbrush: twice daily brush thoroughly for 2 minutes 0.07% Cetylpyridinium chloride: mouth rinse: rinse with 20 mL of mouth rinse for 30 seconds twice daily dental floss: floss the whole mouth once daily

outcome.title: Gestational Age (Weeks)
outcome.population: This data includes the number of subjects who had evaluable data for the obstetric measure (Gestational Age) was 613. Possible reasons for data being declared as non-evaluable includes: being dropped from the study, failing to have enough product for the duration of pregnancy, missing multiple visits, or failing other protocol criteria.
